item.title: Spaces Announcement ðŸŽ‰
item.description: As we grow, we want to provide space for more conversations. Keeping discussion on-topic in this room is the right thing to do, but off-topic conversation is fun - and it builds a stronger community. So, as Spaces have made it out of labs, and we want to increase the community feeling, we decided to give it a go - so we are excited to announce our new Python community Space:
